name: Boulder
desc: A hard, solid chunk of stone that is well-suited for ramming into targets.
forced_movement: _Forced Movement_ may move this _Feature, but reduces the value by 3, or 1 if it is [_Earthbend_]. Forced Movement used in this way may not be used to Destroy the Feature. This _Forced Movement_ is always _Forceful_. If the _Forced Movement_ is already _Forceful_, deal +1 Damage. If the _Boulder_ moved to a lower _Elevation_, deal +1 Damage.
destroy: Make this space _Veiled_ and _Uneven Earth_. Inflict  _Dazed_ 1, _Push_ 1, 2 Crush Damage [_Avoidable_] on a creature of your choice adjacent to the _Feature_.

name: Earth Pillar
desc: A pillar of stone that can survive nearly all hardships.
destroy:
Choose one:
* Create a _Line_ 2 _Hazard_ on the opposite side of this Feature. At the end of the _Round_, remove this Feature and inflict 6 Damage, _Dazed_ 1, _Prone_ [2 _Stamina_] on all creatures in the _Hazard_ spaces, then make those spaces _Uneven Earth_. Any creature in the Feature's space when it is removed immediately _Falls_.
* As above, but pay 2 _Momentum_ to resolve the effect immediately.

name: Earth Spire
desc: A sharp, pointed stone ready to pierce an unfortunate soul.
forced_movement: [_Earthbend_] _Forced Movement_ may move this _Feature, but reduces the value by 2. _Forced Movement_ used in this way may not be used to _Destroy_ the _Feature_. A space of _Forced Movement_ may be used to rotate this _Feature_.
destroy: Place a _Large Improvised_ Weapon in this space. It is made of Stone and has the _Fragile_ and _Opportune_ keywords.
special: When this _Feature_ is created, choose one face. If a creature _Collides_ with this _Feature_ on that face, deal Stab Damage and inflict _Bleeding_ equal to the _Vulnerable_ inflicted. Treat this space as _Jagged_ for larger creatures that can occupy it.

name: Ice Panel
desc: A thin sheet of ice, easy to break through.
destroy: Inflict _Frozen_ 1 on a creature of your choice adjacent to the _Feature_ and make this space _Rimed_. If _Destroyed_ by a _Collision_, the Colliding creature is always the Target. Do not resolve this if Destroyed by a _Draw_ effect.

name: Ice Pillar
desc: A pillar of ice that is sturdier than most.
destroy:
Choose one:
* Create a _Line_ 2 _Hazard_ on the opposite side of this Feature. At the end of the _Round_, remove this Feature and inflict _Frozen_ 1, _Prone_ [1 _Stamina_] on all creatures in the _Hazard_ spaces, then make those _Rimed_ and_Frigid Air_. Any creature in the Feature's space when it is removed immediately _Falls_.
* As above, but pay 2 _Momentum_ to resolve the effect immediately. Do not resolve this if Destroyed by a _Draw_ effect.

name: Ice Wall
desc: A solid wall of ice that can provide a suitable block.
destroy: Inflict _Frozen_ 1 on a creature of your choice adjacent to the _Feature_ and make this space _Rimed_. If _Destroyed_ by a _Collision_, the Colliding creature is always the Target. Do not resolve this if Destroyed by a _Draw_ effect.

name: Large Tree
desc: A sturdy tree capable of being climbed.
special:
* Creatures _Climbing_ this _Feature_ occupy its space. While _Climbing_, they are always at least _Lightly Obscured_ and have _Light Cover_ and do not suffer the normal downsides for _Climbing_..
* If _Flammable_ is triggered, this Feature is not _Destroyed_; instead, it acts as a _Blazing_ space without _Fleeting_. Any creature that _Collides_ with this _Tree_ triggers the _Blazing_ effect.
forced_movement: [_Woodbend_] _Forced Movement_ may move this _Feature, but reduces the value by 5. _Forced Movement_ used in this way may not be used to _Destroy_ the _Feature_.
destroy:
Choose one:
* Create two parallel and touching _Line_ 5 _Hazard_ on the opposite side of this Feature. At the end of the _Round_, remove this Feature and inflict 6 Damage, _Dazed_ 1, _Prone_ [3 _Stamina_] on all creatures in the _Hazard_ spaces. Any creature in the Feature's space when it is removed immediately _Falls_.
* As above, but pay 2 _Momentum_ to resolve the effect immediately.

name: Planted Shield
desc: A shield planted firmly in the ground to provide cover.
effect: Hardness and Element are the same as the original shield. If it takes Damage equal to half of its Hardness or greater the Feature is removed and the shield is placed undamaged in the space. If a creature is in this feature's space they may use their own _Reactions_ and _Negate_ if the shield is Attacked as if they were being attacked.
special: This Feature does not block Movement.
interact: 1 _AP_: You must be in the same space as the shield to use this. Use _Raise Defense_ with the planted shield; if you leave this space, immediately lose _Defenseing_. You may not change the orientation of the _Arc_.
destroy: The original shield is placed _Sundered_ in this space.

name: Water Veil
desc: A suspended veil of water that provides considerable block against assault.
special: Any creature that enters this _Feature's_ space or ends their _Turn_ in it gains _Armored_ 1. Creatures always have _Resistance_ 1 to _Fire_ _Attacks_ that pass through this _Feature_.
destroy:
* If _Destroyed_ by a _Draw_ effect, nothing occurs.
* If _Destroyed_ by _Fire_/_Lightning_ Damage this space becomes _Veiled_.
* If the space this _Feature_ is in becomes _Icy_ or _Destroyed_ by _Cold_ Damage, replace it with an _Ice Panel_.
* If _Destroyed_ by any other means, the space becomes _Wet_.
